testCases.label: Verify DAO getAllFlights returns all seeded flights
testCases.description: Calls flightDAO.getAllFlights() and asserts the resultant list contains all six known Flight records (ids with their expected city pairs).

testCases.label: Verify DAO getFlightById finds flight id 6
testCases.description: Retrieves flight id 6 using flightDAO.getFlightById(6) and verifies it equals Flight(6, 'dallas', 'tampa'), failing the test if the result is null.

testCases.label: Verify DAO getFlightById finds flight id 4
testCases.description: Calls flightDAO.getFlightById(4) and checks that it returns Flight(4, 'morgantown', 'dallas'), failing if the DAO returns null.

testCases.label: Verify DAO getAllFlightsFromCityToCity using reston and morgantown flights
testCases.description: Uses flightDAO.getAllFlightsFromCityToCity("reston", "morgantown") and verifies the list contains only the reston-to-morgantown flight (id 3) and excludes unrelated flights.

testCases.label: Verify DAO getAllFlightsFromCityToCity using tampa and dallas flights
testCases.description: Calls flightDAO.getAllFlightsFromCityToCity("tampa", "dallas") and asserts that only the two tampa-to-dallas flights (ids 1 and 5) are included, while other routes are not.

testCases.label: Verify DAO InsertFlight and the inserted flight is retrievable by id
testCases.description: Inserts a new Flight("tampa", "morgantown") via flightDAO.insertFlight(...) and then verifies that flightDAO.getFlightById(7) returns Flight(7, "tampa", "morgantown").

testCases.label: Verify DAO InsertFlight and the inserted flight is retrieved with all other flights
testCases.description: Inserts a new Flight("tampa", "morgantown"), then calls flightDAO.getAllFlights() and checks that the returned list contains Flight(7, "tampa", "morgantown").

testCases.label: Verify DAO updateFlight changes route
testCases.description: Updates flight id 1 using flightDAO.updateFlight(1, new Flight("reston", "dallas")) and confirms that getFlightById(1) returns the updated Flight(1, "reston", "dallas").

testCases.label: Verifies Service getAllFlights method logic
testCases.description: Mocks mockFlightDAO.getAllFlights() to return a list of four flights and verifies that flightService.getAllFlights() returns exactly the same list.

testCases.label: Verifies Service addFlight method logic
testCases.description: Mocks mockFlightDAO.insertFlight(newFlight) to return a persisted Flight(1, "dallas", "morgantown"), then asserts flightService.addFlight(newFlight) returns that flight and verifies insertFlight(...) was invoked.

testCases.label: Verifies Service getFlightsFromCityToCity method logic
testCases.description: Mocks DAO responses so that only the tampa-to-dallas flights (801 and 804) are in the city-to-city list, then checks flightService.getAllFlightsFromCityToCity("tampa", "dallas") is non-null and contains those two flights.

testCases.label: Verifies Service updateFlight method logic
testCases.description: Sets up mockFlightDAO to know about several flights and to return an expected updated Flight(801, "dallas", "morgantown"); then verifies flightService.updateFlight(801, f801) returns that expected flight.

testCases.label: Verifies Service updateFlight returns null when flight is missing
testCases.description: Attempts to update a non-existent flight with id 801 and asserts that flightService.updateFlight(801, f801) returns null, representing a failed update.
